title: Patience
verses: James 1:2–4 (WEB) — “Count it all joy… knowing that the testing of your faith produces endurance. Let endurance have its perfect work…”
Romans 12:12 (WEB) — “Rejoicing in hope; enduring in troubles; continuing steadfastly in prayer.”
Galatians 5:22 (WEB) — “But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, and faithfulness.”
Psalm 37:7 (WEB) — “Rest in Yahweh, and wait patiently for him.”
Ephesians 4:2 (WEB) — “With all lowliness and humility, with patience, bearing with one another in love.”
body: Slow down and submit your pace to God. Trials train endurance; interruptions invite gentleness. Breathe, pray, and choose a measured response. Trust God’s timing as you take the next faithful step.
prayer: Father, grow the fruit of patience in me. Help me wait well, respond gently, and trust your timing in all things. Amen.
